snippet.title: Atelier Lulua: The Scion of Arland | Launch Trailer | PS4
snippet.description: 'The future of this world rests on the shoulders of a single girl.' Revisit the nostalgic world of Arland and embark on an exciting journey of alchemy together with Rorona's daughter, Lulua.
